item.title: A Minty-Fresh Power Pack
item.description: Before the ubiquity of powerbanks, there was nothing on the market to provide longer battery life for portable electronics. Connecting a female USB connector to four rechargable AA batteries opened up a new world of extended iPod playback. I built a simple, rechargable battery pack to keep the tunes playing on long road trips. The iPod is alive! President's Choice rechargable batteries and some janky wiring is all it took.
